author: potuz
content: <@968526635735326741> <@795439202732867594> figured this is a good channel to ask. Are we looking at about 6 seconds to broadcast and aggregate and broadcast the aggregates 35K attestations today? is this number ballpark accurate? (35K attestations is the current beacon committee). I have a series of questions about broadcasting of attestations that I would like to ask and modifications that I would like to ask for your optinion, I think this is the right channel to ask, but if you want me to move elsewhere I can do that

author: raulvk
content: here is fine for me. sharing [my most recent notes](https://www.notion.so/efdn/Attestation-propagation-networking-perspective-247d9895554180d2991fd8602d5bb472) on attestation propagation at the networking layer, in case you find them useful
